headline: Ford Motor Company Board Declares Dividend for Second-Quarter 2025
summary: DEARBORN, Mich., April 28, 2025--The board of directors of Ford Motor Company today declared a second-quarter regular dividend of 15 cents per share on the company’s outstanding common and Class B stock.

headline: GM beats on Q1 results but pulls guidance as tariff deal with White House nears
summary: General Motors (GM) reported first quarter earnings on Tuesday morning that topped expectations. The biggest of the Big Three automakers said investors could no longer "rely" on its forward guidance as it grapples with the effects of President Trump's auto tariffs.

raw.headline: GM beats on Q1 results but pulls guidance as tariff deal with White House nears
raw.summary: General Motors (GM) reported first quarter earnings on Tuesday morning that topped expectations. The biggest of the Big Three automakers said investors could no longer "rely" on its forward guidance as it grapples with the effects of President Trump's auto tariffs.

headline: Canadian Auto Workers Vow to Fight U.S. Tariffs
summary: Unlike their U.S. counterparts, union auto workers in Canada are taking a hard line against President Trump’s tariffs and vowing retaliation if automakers such as Ford Motor and General Motors shift production away from Canada.  Lana Payne, president of the Canadian union Unifor, stood before hundreds of workers in Windsor, Ontario on Saturday.

headline: Electric Vehicles Today - Off-Highway Electric Vehicles Set for Major Market Growth
summary: The off-highway electric vehicle (OHEV) market is set to expand significantly, with projections indicating growth from $5.48 billion in 2024 to $56.48 billion by 2034. This expansion is largely driven by the increasing adoption of electric technologies in the construction, agriculture, and mining sectors as they strive to reduce emissions and improve operational efficiencies. Key factors contributing to this growth include technological innovations in battery efficiency, charging...
